message.content: This question requires knowledge about electrical devices and how they convert electrical energy into sound. An object that can convert electrical energy into sound is an iPhone or any other electronic device with speakers. Option (B) is incorrect because a soft carpet is not capable of converting electrical energy into sound. Option (D) is incorrect because a wooden table does not have the necessary components to convert electrical energy into sound.
